description:
Montreal, March 10, 2014 - Software Architect and low-level programmer Martin Gadbois shortly presents Paramiko, a Python 2.6+ and 3.3+ implementation of the SSHv2 protocol providing both client and server functionality.

* Paramiko: http://www.paramiko.org/
* Prezi info: http://sflx.ca/paramidia
* Martin: http://sflx.ca/mgadbois
* MP44: http://sflx.ca/mp44e
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Paramiko in 5 minutes: SSHv2 in Python #MP44
